entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
